CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 17, 1962, pg. 9 reads: "Fluffy Footwear - Alvin Gross, manager of Kirby's Shoe Store, 6019 Penn Ave., shows a customer the latest in slippers for the winter months. A variety of footwear, both fancy and practical, is available for gifts for the holiday."
TitMainTitle: Alvin Gross, manager, offering fluffy slippers to female customer in Kirby's Shoe Store, 6019 Penn Avenue
